code: const prueba=[{id:"1",name:"Producto 1",description:"Producto 1",image:"https://ionicframework.com/docs/img/demos/thumbnail.svg"},{id:"2",name:"Producto 2",description:"Producto 2",image:"https://ionicframework.com/docs/img/demos/thumbnail.svg"}];export function searchDataProducts(){if(!localStorage["products"]){localStorage["products"]=JSON.stringify(prueba);}let products=localStorage["products"];products=JSON.parse(products);return products;}export function removeDataProduct(remove){let products=searchDataProducts();products=products.filter(product=>product.id!==remove);localStorage["products"]=JSON.stringify(products);}export function saveDataProduct(product){let products=searchDataProducts();products.push(product);localStorage["products"]=JSON.stringify(products);}export function reloadDataProducts(){localStorage.removeItem("products");return searchDataProducts();}
